Package edu.rit.gec8773.laps

Class BNFWriter

java.lang.Object
edu.rit.gec8773.laps.util.BNFWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class BNFWriter
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
A BNFWriter is used to print Parsers recursively in a Backusâ€“Naur form (BNF) style grammar definition

  • Method Details

    • writeGrammar

      public void writeGrammar​(Parser topDownParser)
      Recursively writes parsing rules to the writer starting at the argument topDownParser. If the parsing rule or the name of the topDownParser rule is null, this method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      topDownParser - the head of the parsing graph

    • close

      public void close() throws IOException
      Closes writer unless it is System.out

      Throws:
      IOException
